description: doc: fix weekly.2011-12-06 release notes typo

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

On Tue, Dec 6, 2011 at 6:27 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg
>
>
> Description:
> doc: fix weekly.2011-12-06 release notes typo
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5453072/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5453072/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M .hgtags
>  M doc/devel/weekly.html
>
>
> Index: .hgtags
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/.hgtags
> +++ b/.hgtags
> @@ -97,5 +97,3 @@
>  b4a91b6933748db1a7150c06a1b55a**d506e52906 weekly.2011-11-18
>  80db2da6495a20ddff8305c2368258**11db8c8665 weekly.2011-12-01
>  0beb796b4ef8747af601ed5ea6766d**5b1340086b weekly.2011-12-02
> -**79599eec5285da7ea8be43e1243bcd**106ba0760e weekly.2011-12-06
> -**79599eec5285da7ea8be43e1243bcd**106ba0760e weekly
> Index: doc/devel/weekly.html
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/doc/devel/weekly.html
> +++ b/doc/devel/weekly.html
> @@ -23,9 +23,9 @@
>
>  Type elision in arrays, slices, or maps of composite literals has been
>  extended to include pointers to composite literals. Code like this
> -       var t = []&T{&T{}, &T{}}
> +       var t = []*T{&T{}, &T{}}
>  may now be written as
> -       var t = []&T{{}, {}}
> +       var t = []*T{{}, {}}
>  You can use gofmt -s to simplify such code.
>
>  The strconv package has been given a more idiomatic and efficient
> interface.
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0c39eee85b0d ***

doc: fix weekly.2011-12-06 release notes typo
